verbose_text: We observed that the I K densities and Kv2.1 expression induced by TGFbeta 1 are sensitive to the narrow time-window of 7-8 DIC, in which the I K properties are close to those of mature CGNs [XREF_BIBR], but the GDF15 induced effect on the I K density and Kv2.1 expression only occur at 4-5 DIC (XREF_FIG), when the neurons were in an immature state.
